Description: A pitch black shockwave of dark energy rushes towards a target. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing dark damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 13 or more, the target rolls its next attack with disadvantage. If it activates a move that requires a saving throw, the target(s) have advantage on the roll.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
